info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Fisher County through 745 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm near Rotan, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamlin, Rotan, Roby, Sylvester, Hobbs, Longworth, Mccaulley, Hitson and Us-180 Near The Fisher-Scurry County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
